definition: home/family/(polite) my (sister, uncle etc)/classifier for families or businesses/refers to the philosophical schools of pre-Han China/noun suffix for a specialist in some activity, such as a musician or revolutionary, corresponding to English -ist, -er, -ary or -ian/CL:個|个[ge4]
owner/master/host/individual or party concerned/God/Lord/main/to indicate or signify/trump card (in card games)
president (title of the head of state of China and several other nations)

sentences.english: British nationalism ebbs and flows in its intensity.
sentences.chinese: 英國國家主義的強度時高時低。

sentences.english: Hu said that China supports Equatorial Guinea's efforts in safeguarding its sovereignty and security.
sentences.chinese: 中方支持赤幾維護國家主權和安全的努力。

sentences.english: Finally, it should realize the willing assignment of national sovereignty on the trans-frontier pollution issue.
sentences.chinese: 最後需要在越境污染問題上國家主權權力的自願讓渡。

sentences.english: Nazism was not only nationalism run amok.
sentences.chinese: 納粹不僅僅是殺氣騰騰的國家主義。

sentences.english: National sovereignty was previously a standard held aloft mainly by British eurosceptics.
sentences.chinese: 以前，國家主權主要是英國“疑歐派”高舉的旗幟。

sentences.english: He blasted East European critics as 'collaborators with Fascism.
sentences.chinese: 他指責東歐的評論家爲“極端國家主義的同謀”。

sentences.english: The sovereignty of States must no longer be used as a shield for gross violations of human rights.
sentences.chinese: 國家主權不能再被用作嚴重侵犯人權的擋箭牌。

sentences.english: Its drafter's intention was to put sovereignty in the hands of the people .
sentences.chinese: 起草人的意圖是要把國家主權置於人民手中。

sentences.english: The Anti-Secession Law was enacted to resolutely safeguard China's sovereignty and territorial integrity.
sentences.chinese: 制定反分裂國家法，堅決維護國家主權和領土完整。

sentences.english: But he answered one of them, `Friend, I am not being unfair to you.
sentences.chinese: 家主回答其中的一人說，朋友，我不虧負你。

sentences.english: The first is how the idea should be related to that of state sovereignty.
sentences.chinese: 第一個問題是人權思想如何與國家主權思想相聯的。

sentences.english: Chapter five mainly analyses the subject and object of the national sovereignty transference with self-determination and finity .
sentences.chinese: 第五章主要研究國家主權自主有限讓渡的主體和客體。

sentences.english: The international capitalists dictate and the nation’s sovereignty becomes a sham.
sentences.chinese: 這樣國際資本家擁有支配權，而國家主權淪爲傀儡。

sentences.english: For the kingdom of heaven is like unto a man that is an householder, which went out early in the morning to hire labourers into his vineyard.
sentences.chinese: 因爲天國好像家主，清早去僱人，進他的葡萄園作工。

sentences.english: They were all virulently pacifistic and anti-nationalistic.
sentences.chinese: 他們堅持極度的和平主義和反國家主義。

sentences.english: The right-maintaining ideas embody Zhang(Zhidong's) consciousness of nation's sovereignty.
sentences.chinese: 讓利爭權的維權思想，體現了張之洞的國家主權意識。

definition: head of a clan/natural leader/person of prestige and authority in a domain/suzerain
elder/term of respect for a Buddhist monk
eldest grandson/the eldest son of one's eldest son
learned person/expert in a certain field/abbr. for 大方之家[da4 fang1 zhi1 jia1]
paraphernalia of a guard of honor
to perform one's job/attendant/job/duties/(respectful appellation for the addressee) you/your Excellency/(Church) deacon
counselor of king or feudal warlord/henchman
the Zhou family (household, firm etc)/Jow-Ga Kung Fu - Martial Art
